segments.text: Hello . This is Jones . I'd like to speak to Mr . Chen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to discuss the new order with you . Would you like to have lunch together at Garden Hotel next Tuesday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me check my diary . Er . I'm afraid I can't make Tuesday . I've got to go to Beijing for a conference . I'll come back on Thursday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a pity . Does Friday suit you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , that would be fine . What time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , that's fine . Next Friday at 12 at Garden Hotel . I'll look forward to it .
segments.speaker: S1
